translations.chinese: 詔曰：「擇可以為梁王、淮陽王者。」
translations.english: The edict said: "Select who can be King of Liang, King of Huaiyang."

translations.chinese: 燕王綰、相國何等請立子恢為梁王，子友為淮陽王。
translations.english: King Yan Wan, prime minister He and others requested establishing son Hui as King of Liang, son You as King of Huaiyang.
Abolished Dong commandery, added much to Liang.
Abolished Yingchuan commandery, added much to Huaiyang.
In the fourth month of summer, he traveled from Luoyang to arrive.
